com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app

Interface AppPublics.BroadcastListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AppPublics.ComponentBroadcastListener, AppPublics.LoadingBroadcastListener, AppPublics.ReloadBroadcastListener, SmartSplashScreenActivity
    Enclosing class:
    AppPublics

    public static interface AppPublics.BroadcastListener
    This interface is a wrapper around a regular Android native BroadcastReceiver, by capturing the Context.registerReceiver(android.content.BroadcastReceiver, IntentFilter) invocation and implementation is one place. When a Activity or Fragment Smartable entity implements that interface, the framework will register a BroadcastReceiver, and unregister automatically during its life cycle.

    It indicates what kind of broadcast Intent are being listened to, and how to handle them, and enables to express both some Intent filters, and their consumption at the same place.

    The framework will request this interface methods during the Activity.onCreate(android.os.Bundle) or Fragment.onCreate(android.os.Bundle) methods, create a corresponding BroadcastReceiver and register it. This created BroadcastReceiver will be unregistered during the Activity.onDestroy() or Fragment.onDestroy() method.

    Since:
    2010.02.04
    See Also:
    Smarted#registerBroadcastListeners(BroadcastListener[]), AppPublics.BroadcastListenerProvider, AppPublics.BroadcastListenersProviders

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      android.content.IntentFilter getIntentFilter()
      This method will be invoked by the framework to determine what IntentFilter should be associated to the current listener.
      void onReceive(android.content.Intent intent)
      Is invoked every time an intent that matches is received by the underlying activity.

    • Method Detail

      • getIntentFilter

        android.content.IntentFilter getIntentFilter()
        This method will be invoked by the framework to determine what IntentFilter should be associated to the current listener.

        The returned value of the method will be used to invoke the Context.registerReceiver(android.content.BroadcastReceiver, IntentFilter) method. If this method is annotated with AppPublics.UseNativeBroadcast, the implementation will use the LocalBroadcastManager implementation.

        Returns:
        if not null, only the intents that match with this returned value, will be received by the activity
        See Also:
        onReceive(Intent)

      • onReceive

        void onReceive(android.content.Intent intent)
        Is invoked every time an intent that matches is received by the underlying activity.
        Parameters:
        intent - the broadcast Intent which has been received, and which matches the declared IntentFilter
        See Also:
        getIntentFilter()
